I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home in your time of need.

name: Linda Wesch
text: Thank you, Mobile Memorial Gardens,  for helping me and my family through this traumatic time!

name: Sherrilyn Wilson
text: I and my family are so grateful to all the staff at Mobile Memorial Gardens for the wonderful job they all did to help us through the difficult loss of my brother. The amazingly tender and sensitive care they gave to all of us was incredible. I highly recommend MMG to anyone suffering the loss of their loved ones, I do believe they will not regret it.

name: Charles H (Gonzo Photog)
text: Very nice folks, did their work with the respect and dignity you’d expect.

name: Ben Andrews
text: We had a great experience here such caring an concerned people an the make sure all your needs are met an you get great service thank you Martin powers for all your help to make our experience the best it could

name: John Henderson
text: Professional, timely and responsive to clients and the funeral process.

name: Dianne Jordan
text: I can't say enough about the caring, compassionate service my family received from Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home. My mother passed in 2017 and my father in June 2020. The staff took care of everything as far as guiding me in what needed to be done. My parents had pre-arrangements in place and that was a huge comfort, financially but most importantly emotionally. I can remember my mother talking about how helpful and friendly the staff were when she and my father were making their arrangements. It felt as if my family was part of the Mobile Memorial Gardens' family. Even down to little things such as holding and caring for the flowers and plants until I could get back there to pick them up. Little things, but those small acts of kindness make all the difference in the world. I am currently starting the process of taking care of my pre-arrangements. There is no one I trust more than Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home.

name: Cindy
text: Everyone was so helpful and attentive during the whole funeral process. It made a difficult time easier for my entire family. I felt that the staff truly cared while, at the same time, was very professional from beginning to end.

name: Amy Walker
text: Lovely mortuary and very convenient having one on the grounds of the cemetery.  We (unfortunately) had to recently bury two of my family members there, both of whom used the funeral home and were given very respectful treatment.  I will eventually be buried here as we own plots in the cemetery and hope we will be also able to use their services.  Hopefully not for a VERY long time since right now we could only afford burlap sacks at this point! :D

name: Martin Dorsett
text: The celebration of life for our Mother was wonderful. I am thankful for Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home and their staff for all they did to make it possible. Martin and John went above and beyond the call. Every detail was attended to in a compassionate and professional way.

name: Wanda Brown
text: Everyone genuinely cared about us during this difficult/emotional time. I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens to take care of your loved ones when the time comes.

name: Danyell Stewart
text: Sy and his staff made a very difficult time easier than I imagined. He walked us through step by step. Listened to us talk about our beautiful Granny and how we could honor her. He listened and made sure that every detail and every request was met and exceed our expectations!! Thank you is not enough when someone becomes an “angel “ 💕🙏🏻☺️

name: Dee Burrow
text: Mobile Memorial Gardens have the most thoughtful and caring staff that our family has delt with. From beginning to end they met every need and expectation. Even weeks after they where calling to check on our family to see if there was anything further they could do to help us in our transition. We would recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens to all our friends and family who would  like a facility that leads you though your transition with professionalism and care.

name: Phyllis Ducote
text:
Mobile Memorial Gardens is a wonderful place to go in the time of need.   The staff is very helpful and really is concerned about every detail. It was a good experience and everyone who attended my husbands funeral said what a great job they did.   They felt they may use Mobile Memorial Gardens in the future.

Thank you

Phyllis Ducote

name: Terri McNellage
text:
Worked with Sid on our mother's recent funeral arrangements.  He was great to work with and helped us walk through the process. My parents had pre-arranged their funerals in 1993 and things were different then however he worked it all out and completed our funeral needs as written.  Memorial Gardens Funeral Home honored the written policy (However, Memorial Garden Cemetery didn’t do the same - they were one company in 1993 but now they are two totally different companies) The Funeral Home stood by the prearrangements from 1993. however the Cemetery did not. But thankfully the Funeral home stepped up and covered the difference when the Cemetery tried to charge us over and above the prearrangements written agreement. Buyer beware!
Sidney again was great to work with in person, by phone, text and/or email (even over a holiday)

The day of the service everyone was very helpful and respectful of our needs and assisted us in doings things the way our mother would have wanted.

Thank you Sid for your kindness and understanding!

Thank you for the time and concern you gave us during this time.

name: Jabe Fincher
text: this is a nice cemetery. Well kept and nice staff people.

name: Jack S
text: Cemetery charges $6700 seem legitimate. Funeral home charges about$10,500 seem excessive. Total over $17,000. For a modest funeral. I feel like I was taken to the cleaners by a used car dealer.

name: Riley Brenes
text: Funeral homes are notoriously underhanded. Everyone knows someone who has been manipulated into ridiculous costs while grieving. Apparently additions abound when it comes to closing the casket on life. Surprisingly, I didn’t feel pressured into anything or swayed or even the slightest swindle from Memorial Gardens to spend. There I was-  a 32yr old, young father, barely  getting my “adulting” abilities in check when suddenly, I found myself having to navigate the funerary process solo for my late grandmother. Thankfully; Buffy, Nick, and Elizabeth at MG made it simple, affordable, and exactly how my uniquely particular grandmother would have wanted it. I’m thankful for their help and recommend MG to everyone. In the midsts of the fly-by-night funerary groups in town, there is a reason MG has been under the same management for decades: they sincerely care about families and it shows in the way they do business. Truly a blessing to Mobile County.

resp.text: Our passion to help those in need is why we get up every day and help families like yours.  We truly appreciate your trust in us to care for you and you loved one through this process.

name: Jenny Ruhberg
text: My father had his funeral yesterday and I can’t say enough what a wonderful job they did. It’s a beautiful place and all the people there are truly amazing. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

name: martyloper
text: The staff was so thoughtful and caring ❤

name: Kim Murray
text: Julie was so helpful to us in our time of need as we helped our children plan services for their sweet Baby Kellynn Kate. Julie was so understanding and did all she could to help us plan the services as quickly as possible. Through all of this every single person was so caring.

resp.text: Mrs.Murray, thank you for your kind words and trust in the care we provided. We at Mobile Memorial Funeral Home, strive to serve each and every family as if they are our own. We are truly grateful for your feedback — it was our honor to assist you and your family.

name: Sharon Long
text: Visited a wake for a old friend. The place is beautiful and peaceful.

name: Michael Peaden
text: Very nice place to have funeral services at !

name: Larry Bullington
text: 1960 buried my brother Aubrey Bullington

name: Steve Rigsby
text: My family has dealt with Collins Burke for over 55 years! We have been made feel comfortable as possible during our times of sadness and heartbreak. They have always worked to help us in all aspects to bring peace during the worst of times.

name: Bill Will
text: It was Abad day but I'm going to be honest I had acomable feeling from the start

name: Susan Wiederhold
text:
1 star only because it is not possible to give it no stars. I am assuming that the other one star review slipped through and the others have been deleted. I sincerely doubt any business receives 5 stars on Ever.Single.Review.

A very dear friend buried his father after his recent death and this is what happened. It is beyond reprehensible. A family suffers a grievous loss and the funeral home is rude, unsympathetic and totally incompetent.

This is the gist of what happened:

Danny Harbison
7 hrs ·
I don't usually make these kinds of posts, and this won't apply to most people on my friends' list, but this is one that has to be made: The Collins-Burke Funeral Home in Jasper, AL completely dropped the ball on my father's funeral. There were no details about my father's funeral on their website until AFTER the service. My Mother In Law could not even send flowers because of this, and they could give no details on when and where the funeral was being held until just 18 hours before the service.
If you live in the Walker County, Alabama area, I would suggest avoiding this company as being unprofessional, and completely lacking in compassion and basic human decency. As I said, I don't usually make these kinds of posts, but this company seemed to go out of its way to make a difficult time even more unpleasant.

As someone who buried her middle son in Texas in September under the auspices of a funeral home and director who could NOT have been more kind to his stunned wife and our family, I find it morally abhorrent that the home put the family through this.

name: Sonja R. Thomas
text: The staff was very attentive and understanding to our family member needs. Willingness to provide cost effective options which is not the "norm" for this type of services provider.

name: Sonya Skinner
text: When Fred Burke died, so did this business.  He let people bury their dead, regardless of their financial ability, with dignity.

name: Sherri Walker
text: The staff was very professional,did everything my family asked. Was the best in our time of the worst.

name: Teresa McCombs
text: I was not offered a guess book or asked if we needed someone to say a few words. No music during viewing or told we needed to bring some.

name: Jason Latham
text: Nice people work here. But a sad environment

name: JD Colombini
text: Alabama Heritage provides professionalism, but more than that, kind, caring representatives. Our loved ones requests, as well as ours, was first and foremost their priority. They readily accommodated requests and ensured our loved one was honored!

resp.text: Your review truly reaffirms our commitment to offering professional and honorable service, JD.  Thank you for trusting us to accommodate your requests and please do not hesitate to call if there is anything else we may attend to.  -Brandy Blakely, General Manager

name: HD
text: We felt like they were selling us a car! It was a very bad experience. We went with another funeral home for my moms service who made us feel so comfortable and their compassion was real unlike this place.

resp.text: This is never an experience we wish for any of our families to encounter.  Please feel free to reach out to me personally at Brandy.blakely2@dignitymemorial.com so that I may address your experience with our staff.  Thank you for your time and I look forward to speaking with you.  -Brandy Blakely, General Manager

name: Pamela Towns
text: I have nothing but high praises for the staff at Alabama Heritage. During such a time when sorting through details felt numbing because of the stress of having lost a loved one, the director seemed to understand this perfectly as he had excellent follow-up and and a caring tone. Thank you for everything you did for me as well as my family!

resp.text: Pamela, we are beyond grateful that you allowed us to assist you during such a sensitive time of need, and I deeply appreciate your lovely words. I will be sure to bring your thoughtful message to the rest of the team and should you need anything else, I hope you will feel free to reach out to us.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Jody Stratton
text: Every death is difficult.  Especially during a pandemic. The entire staff,  especially Ms. Beth Calloway, were truly exceptional. Beth took her time with my family and didn't rush us or pressure us. She had excellent suggestions and went out of her way to make us feel like her own family. Beth made the process easy and completely fulfilled our wishes with a few special touches of her own. She was very thoughtful.

resp.text: Jody, our team is passionate about offering the compassionate and professional care that is absolutely essential throughout this process and I appreciate you taking a moment to recognize Beth's easy and exceptional service in such a thoughtful message. Please know that you are in our thoughts and we are here for you if there is anything else that you need.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Caleb Sigler
text: Any death is difficult, and my father’s death was particularly hard for myself and my family. The people at Alabama Heritage went above an beyond to make sure our experience was exactly what we needed. We had many extra challenges including COVID, timing, and weather... Beth and Mike took care of every detail with patience and kindness. No wants to go through what we did, but the experience we had was as ideal as it could possibly be. Would highly recommend working with them when you lose a loved one.

resp.text: Caleb, thank you for sharing such a thoughtful review with us.  We considered it an immense honor to  be of service and are so touched by your recognition. Thank you again for honoring us with your kind words and please know that we are always here for you and your family. - Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Debbie Brantley
text: Our experience with Alabama Heritage Funeral Home exceeded my families expectations.   We have used them twice before in the past and it is always consistent.  Henri and Hanni were so kind and helpful. My mother’s passed away during the Covid 19 quarantine so we knew her service and funeral would be different.  It was perfect and just what we asked for.  I highly recommend Alabama Heritage  Funeral  Home.

resp.text: Debbie, from start to finish, we strive to provide support that is compassionate and professional. Thank you very much for letting us know that Henri and Hanni are living up to this goal, and please know that your kind words will be shared with the rest of the team. We are here for you, should you ever need anything else. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Sheila Sealy
text: The entire staff was patient and respectful during this difficult time.  They took care of things we were unaware of and the funeral went smoothly.

resp.text: Sheila, receiving feedback like yours truly reaffirms our commitment to offering patient and respectful  service. From everyone here, thank you very much for sharing.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Martha Compton
text: My 98 year old Mother died at a nursing home in Auburn on May 8.  I had contracted with Alabama Heritage Funeral Home to, at  her death, transport her body to Montgomery.  They did so in a timely way and communicated with me in Auburn all along the way.  Because Mother was to be buried at Arlington National Cemetery, they prepared her body and then transported her quickly on a flight to Arlington, Virginia.  Heritage consistently kept me informed at each step of the process.  They are an exceptionally professional funeral home and everyone I dealt with was  kind and went out of their way to help me.  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Martha, receiving feedback like yours truly reaffirms our commitment to offering exceptional care. From everyone here, thank you very much for sharing. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Keely smith
text:
Paul and Melissa and the entire staff at Alabama Heritage helped our family make the best decisions for our Father's funeral and burial. Everyone has been friendly, compassionate, kind and yet professional from the time we began making plans, through the services and even after my Father's funeral.
This is a difficult time but this team helped put us at ease and ensure that we honored my Father throughout the process. I highly recommend choosing Alabama Heritage, the funeral home itself is beautiful, but Paul and his staff make the difficult time of death so much easier with great care and concern for the family and those grieving the loss of a loved one.  Thank you Alabama Heritage.

resp.text: Keely,  from start to finish, we strive to provide support that is compassionate and professional. Thank you very much for letting us know that we are living up to this goal, and please know that your kind words will be shared with the rest of the team. We are here for you, should you ever need anything else. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Dennis Montgomery
text:
The whole staff and I do mean everyone at Alabama Heritage Funeral was the epitome of class, professionalism, empathy and genuiness in helping me deal with the sudden loss of my wife, Dr. Denise Michelle Chapman-Montgomery. I can't say it enough...THANK YOU, THANK YOU for all you did for me and my family.

I highly recommend Alabama Heritage Funeral as your source for consoling, understanding and genuine compassion.

Thanks once again for a beautiful ceremony.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing such a thoughtful review with us, Dennis. I am touched to hear you say that our team was professional and compassionate throughout the entire process, as this is always our goal.  Thank you again for honoring us with your kind words and please know that we are always here for you and your family. - Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Debbie Kirkland
text: Dignity is the perfect word for Alabama Heritage. I was extremely pleased with the service. The employees are kind and compassionate. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Debbie, receiving feedback like yours truly reaffirms our commitment to offering exceptional care. From everyone here, thank you very much for sharing. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Mike Merrill
text: My experiences with Alabama Heritage Funeral Home have all been positive. They are good people to work with. My mother recently passed away and they were a great asset during this difficult time. I would highly recommend them. Mike in Montgomery, AL

resp.text: Mike, receiving feedback like yours truly reaffirms our commitment to offering exceptional care. From everyone here, thank you very much for sharing. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Angie Hood
text: The people of Alabama Heritage Funeral Home were so kind and thoughtful to us during the celebration of life service and burial for our beloved wife, mother, and grandmother Mrs. Bobbie Wilson.  Everything was done with care and grace, and so many little details were handled effortlessly.  It felt like the staff were members of our own family, guiding us through a terrible time of loss.  We are grateful for their support and help, and we highly recommend this team of very caring people.  The Wilson family is very grateful!

resp.text:
I am touched to hear of your happiness with our services, Angie. Thank you for allowing us to take care of the arrangements, and please know that your recognition means a great deal to our team. If you ever need us in the future, we will be here for you.

-Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Glenn Cook
text: Beautiful facility, very pleasing atmosphere. The staff is very professional, caring and patient. It is a blessing to have such caring people guide you in a difficult time

resp.text: Glenn,  we are honored to guide those we serve through this difficult journey. Our team appreciates your kind acknowledgement and recognition for our team's dedication to service. Thank you for sharing.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Lori Fortin
text: We recommend Alabama Heritage Funeral Home for your needs when a loved one goes to be with the Lord.  The level of care and service was very high!  Casey Nail was very helpful and caring in guiding our family through everything.  Everyone we dealt with was very caring and professional. At such a difficult time, it was wonderful to have the assurance of the people at Alabama Heritage Funeral Home.

resp.text: Your family deserves the highest level of care and service, Lori, so it was our privilege to be here for you during this difficult time. Thank you so much for your recommendation, and please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you in the future. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Pamela McGee
text: The Alabama Heritage Funeral Home Director and staff were very kind and gentle with us during the passing of my mother. We had already purchased everything before hand “pre-needs”, but there was still some things to wrap up. They listened and provided us with exactly what we needed with no pressure. I highly recommend them for all your needs during such a difficult time.

resp.text: Pamela, nothing makes us prouder than hearing that our team was able to provide you with such compassionate service. Being here for those we serve during the most difficult times is something we take very seriously, and I will be sure to convey your recognition to the staff. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and please do not hesitate to reach out if there is anything I can assist you with. - Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Debbie Daniel
text: Sadly I have been through 3 immediate family members buried here and all their services held here.  This is really a nice funeral home.  And their manager, Paul Booker, is wonderful!  He shows great empathy and works so well with the families.  Constantly checking on the family to see if he can do anything more for them.  He is there during the services and very cordial with the guest.  The home is clean and pretty inside and out.  The grounds are maintained very well.  I highly recommend this funeral home.

name: K Elise (Kelise)
text: I want to thank Casey & Paul for taking care of my family during the process of my family member's burial. They were both very helpful & thoughtful throughout this process. Special shout out to Casey for being super kind & making us feel like no question or request is too much or too needy. Burying a loved one is never a fun process, but they made it extremely easy for us.

resp.text: Being here for you during this difficult time is our mission. It's wonderful to hear that Casey & I were key components throughout this process, as we know how hard it can be. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to sere and be there for you. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Danny Creamer
text: Casey and the rest of the staff at Alabama Heritage did an excellent job with my mother’s  visitation and service. They made everything as easy as possible during a difficult time. They even made my favorite cookies with my mother’s recipe to serve during visitation.  They also provided similar excellence during my dad’s funeral almost 15 years earlier.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Danny, thank you for trusting us with your mother's visitation and service. It is our goal to work with families to plan meaningful tributes to their loved ones, and helping you to honor your parents is a responsibility that we take very seriously. Please know that we are here for you any time you need us. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Bubba Flores
text: I could not give a higher recommendation for this Funeral Home.  Our family's grief and stress was mitigated by the professionalism and compassion of this wonderful place.  Paul, Casey, Larry and Lorraine were of particular help to my family over the last two years for funerals of my Grandparents.  I appreciated the careful attention to detail, the flexibility, and willingness of the staff to go above and beyond.  As a military service member, I've participated and attended in my fare share of services.  Alabama Heritage Funeral Home does it right.

name: Deb Schultz
text: We were so pleased with the service we received during my Husbands celebration of life.  Casey and the rest of the Staff made every step of decision making process easy and quick.  Everything fell into place and made the Service and After Service Easy.  Many Friends and Family commented on how pleasant the event was to attend.  Tough times, made easy.  Thank you so much for providing all the forms and tools we needed to assist us.  I would recommend Alabama Heritage to all my Friends and Family when their need arises.

name: Teresa Pinter
text: I could write a book full of great things about Alabama Heritage funeral home and Paul Booker and staff. The level of professionalism and compassion you receive is beyond measure!  They made a very difficult situation run so smoothly. The actual funeral home is beautiful and kept very clean. I also want to personally Thank Paul for making my Mother look so Beautiful!

name: Tiffany Marchand
text:
This funeral home has done 3 of my family members' funerals in the last 10 years. I'm not sure who helped us 10 years ago when my uncle passed away, but they did a great job.

Then last September when my grandfather passed away after a longtime illness, Casey was the funeral director who provided my family with care. She was so loving and comforted anyone she could. At that time, we were both pregnant, due about a month apart. I didn't deal with the planning process in these funerals, but in January when my infant son passed away, I knew immediately which funeral home to go to for services. They went above and beyond to make sure my little boy was taken care of and gave us the opportunity to get many momentos. Even though we did not use their facilities for a visitation or funeral, we still got the same level of service that my grandmother received when she planned my uncle's and grandfather's funerals.

We were one of the first clients of Casey after she came back from maternity leave and she was so compassionate and caring checking to see if there was anything else she could help us with and making sure my husband, daughter and myself were doing as best as we could given the situation. They will always be our go to funeral home for our family in the future for the love and support we got from the entire staff at Alabama Heritage. Thank you, Casey & Paul, for all that y'all have done and continue to do. I would recommend them to anyone. (Sorry for the novel!)

name: Bear Fire31
text: The Staff at Alabama Heritage Funeral Home does a wonderful job when the families have a death. They also help with setting everything up even when one member of the family has things done. Casey also make thing easy to get going. Larry and Paul are great with making sure that thing run fine when time comes to service and buried service.

resp.text: Thank you very much for highlighting our hard work and commitment to those we serve. I will be sure to bring your kind words to Casey and Larry's attention. We are always here to help the families that we serve, so please let us know if there is ever a time that we can help going forward. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Lesa Keith
text: The team at Alabama Heritage made us feel like family during the difficult “unexpected” passing of my mother Eileene Griffith. Certainly she had already planned her funeral; however, as a daughter who has never been into planning, the staff especially Mr. Henri Powe who I had never met, made our entire family feel at ease. He let us see her even after hours and when family is coming in from out if town, it was so heartfelt & never once did the staff make us feel like we were a burden. It was the small acts of genuine concern that I felt every time I walked through their doors. I feel I have to mention this , no one ever really wants to pass down this road & 30 years ago , I passed down this road with my grandma from another funeral home who referred to my grandma as “remains.” I realize there’s truth in a body being “remains ,” but somehow 30 years later, I still found it a memory I wanted to go away . All my grandparents , brother , most of my friends & precious students are right here at Alabama Heritage & I could not feel more at peace . In fact , from a lady that isn’t into planning , I’m actually thinking about planning on finding a place for my husband & I too ! Thank you Alabama Heritage for everything !

resp.text: Lesa, nothing makes us prouder than hearing that a member of our team was able to provide you with such compassionate service. Being here for those we serve during the most difficult times is something we take very seriously, and I will be sure to convey your recognition to Mr. Powe. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and please do not hesitate to reach out if there is anything I can assist you with. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Linda Wright
text: This funeral home provides a very caring and personalized service with great compassion for the family and loved ones. It is a beautiful facility and they are open to creative ways to celebrate your loved one's life. In fact, Paul Booker is very compassionate and creative and is very helpful in creating exact kind of service you want. He truly cares about all of the families he works with. He learns about your loved one's interests and passions and creates a beautiful expression of their life. You will not find a more caring, compassionate, and professional environment in this industry anywhere in the world! Alabama Heritage, and especially, Paul Wesley Booker, are the standard to meet. They go above and beyond.

resp.text: Our team is happy to hear we could help you during this time and we appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you. - Paul Booker, Location Manager

name: Michelle Ellis-McCord
text: Mr. Booker and his staff at Alabama Heritage are very caring individuals.  In a time of great loss and difficulty, they were extremely supportive, helpful, detailed oriented, and professional.  My experiences with them have been extremely positive.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words with us. Your praise of our team is much appreciated, but more importantly, thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve and be there for you during this unfortunate circumstance.

-Paul Booker, General Manager

name: chinmaya sriram
text: Recently we went through a lot with our baby's unexpected death. From the first interaction with Paul Booker and their team through the end of the funeral process everybody is kind, warm and made the process very smooth. They really care for the people and families by checking with us multiple times. Thank you very much from all our family members.

name: Belinda Daily
text: I’ve seen several of the online posts for today’s funerals. I thought dignity was tasteful and elegant.

resp.text: Belinda, thank you for your feedback, as it is truly appreciated.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Richard Vaughn
text: Alabama Heritage did a great job handling my wife's funeral. Very professional, all the details were handled well. Casey Nail, the funeral director, is the best!

resp.text:
Richard, it means a great deal to our team to hear you say that everything was done well. Thank you very much for allowing us to help you honor your wife, and if there is anything else we may do for you, please don't hesitate to ask.

-Paul Booker, General Manager

name: will brantley
text: Could never thank Casey, Paul and all of  staff at Alabama Heritage for the wonderful care that we we received when we lost my sweet brother and mother in an 11 month period!  We will always by thankful for the way we were treated!  We have also gained new friends during this hard time in our lives!  Love you all!

name: Lee
text: I cannot begin to say how wonderful our experience was with Casey and her staff this past March at the funeral of our sweet brother. I was dreading the process due to over zealous sales people at previous funeral arrangements but she immediately put us at ease and was quick to understand our desires. It almost felt as if she was on board as a family member! We also used their catering people to set up a luncheon at the funeral home after the burial service. This worked seamlessly and the food was delicious! The whole process was easy and noninvasive on all levels! Many thanks Casey!

name: Louis Carr
text:
Our mother's recent funeral service at Alabama Heritage (AH) was beyond our expectations.  Every detail was discussed with us and carried out to perfection. The expertise, efforts, and genuine compassion shown by the AH staff set a memory for us that will not be forgotten.  We had so many positive comments from family and friends.
Our mother would have been very pleased with everything.

name: Margaret Neely
text: I would highly recommend Alabama Heritage Funeral Home to anyone needing their services.   All of the staff there are professional, courteous and helpful.  They go out of their way to provide or help with anything that was needed.  I would especially like to commend Casey Nail for her help and service.

name: Allen Flintoft
text: Our family owns Flintoft's Funeral Home in Washington State. We recently had the opportunity to care for a family from Montgomery, Alabama. They need our help getting mom transferred home. We called a number of funeral homes in Montgomery. Paul Booker, at Alabama Heritage, was far and away the best. His kindness, professionalism and attention to detail made all the difference. He was exceptional! Thank you Paul!

resp.text: Our mission is to always provide impeccable and respectful assistance to those we serve, Allen, and it was an honor to work with you. Thank you very much for sharing your thoughtful comments with us. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: De'Shay Milner-Sankey
text: Professional staff and a beautiful facility and grounds. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Marnekia, maintaining the grounds and keeping everything beautiful and professional for our visitors is of paramount importance to us, so it is great to read your review. Thank you, and if you ever need anything, please do not hesitate to reach out.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Margaret Murphy
text: I have attended many services here and have always, ALWAYS been impressed by the competence and true warmth of the staff, as well as the facilities themselves. One particularly difficult service to attend was that of a friend who had committed suicide. From everything that I saw and from what heard from the family, the staff went out of their way to be available at all hours to answer questions or address concerns and to be professional and empathetic at the same time. They do everything possible to make a very difficult and stressful time as painless as it can be. Paul and Casey treat you as family--actually, everyone there does! That is the only place I will use and would recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Margaret, I am pleased to hear that our team was able to make you and your family feel at ease throughout this emotional process. I will share your compliments with the staff, as well as my gratitude. Should you ever need us in the future, please know that we would welcome the opportunity to exceed your expectations once more. -Paul Booker, Location Manager

name: Darlene Kelly
text: This funeral home and cemetery did an awesome job of laying to rest my 11 year old daughter when she passed after a two year battle with brain cancer.  Everyone had such pleasant attitudes and they had my daughter looking absolutely beautiful. Thank you Alabama Heritage.

name: Kathy Norton
text:
In 2018 I had the privilege of meeting Casey Nail upon the death of my Uncle.  She and the staff at Alabama Heritage Funeral Home were very knowledgeable. professional and caring. In 2019 we arranged the funeral of his wife, my Aunt.  Again, I was very pleased. I highly recommend Casey and the staff to help you with ALL your arngements for your loved ones.
Thank you Casey!
James Mathew Smith
Kathy Ruppenthal Norton

resp.text: Your vote of confidence is amazing to receive, Kathy, as it's wonderful to know that you appreciate our knowledgeable and professional care. Thank you for your support, and please let us know if there's anything that we may do for you in the future. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Kathy Williams
text: I want to express my thanks for services rendered for my father’s funeral. Everyone was helpful to our family and guests. I found Paul Booker in particular to be personable, compassionate and professional.

name: Kenny Jones
text: Alabama Heritage and their staff provide excellent and caring service which is extremely important during a difficult time.

resp.text: Kenny, thank you for taking the time to share your kind words with us.  Your praise is much appreciated, but more importantly, thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve and be there for you during this difficult time.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Dylan Macarthur
text: On behalf of the MacArthur family I would just like to say that Alabama Heritage treated us with the utmost respect and compassion during this difficult Tim. Mr Greg Hollis was very thorough and made us very comfortable with our plans to put our Mother and Grandmother at peace .Thankyou so much The MacArthur Family

resp.text: Dylan, thank you for sharing such a kind message with us.  Greg and his team considered it an immense honor to arrange your loved ones service in complete accordance to your wishes, and are so touched by your recognition. Thank you again for honoring us with your kind words and please know that we are always here for you and your family.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Jaclyn Nicole Toole
text:
I cannot express how touched and taken aback by what I experienced at Alabama Heritage Funeral Home. From the minute I walked in the door I was taken to a level of elegance and service that I have never experienced at any other funeral home. Everyone from the staff to the maintenance crew were extremely courteous and professional.

Paul Booker, Casey Nail and their staff went above and beyond to help make my father’s visitation and service be a reflection of the life that he lived.  Many people commented to us that they felt like they were in his den at his home.  Words cannot express how they made us feel.  We were not the only family they had but they made us feel like we were. Their attention to detail surpassed any and all expectations I had.  They literally took us into their arms and treated us like family.

name: Lynn Painter
text: I had a some roses shipped from New York to Heritage Funeral Home for our friend's memorial service and failed to send a vase. I talked with the funeral home and they very graciously supplied a vase and included a card with our message. They were so helpful and kind and even emailed a photo of the finished arrangement . Many thanks for their support.

resp.text: Lynn, our team is happy to know we made such an impact, and appreciate you leaving this kind review. - Paul Booker, Location Manager

name: Kim Byrom
text: Alabama Heritage went above and beyond to handle all the details for my mom's service.  They came to our house to obtain my dad's signature on a form, so he didn't have to come to the funeral home until the day of the service.  They beautifully displayed my mom's quilts and pictures in the reception area.  They packed anything up when it was time to go and offered to help bring plants to our house.  Casey and Paul were a blessing to our family during this difficult time.

resp.text: Kim, we are proud to go above and beyond to meet the needs of those we serve. Thank you very much for taking a moment to highlight our efforts. -Paul Booker, Location Manager

name: Shamicka Green Charles
text: We held my mom's memorial service at Alabama Heritage. I love everything about that place. It was decorated beautifully, the staff was friendly and helpful; willing to schedule time outside of business hours to accommodate my siblings from out of town. They helped with every step of the process and gave plenty of hugs and kleenex. When I brought my toddler up there,bthey helped entertain him while we handled business. The director came up with personalized mementos to make the memorial special for my family. They had the repast catered so that my family was able to dine in the reception hall on site, without traveling elsewhere. Everyone said that the food was delicious. I highly recommend using Alabama Heritage for your loved one's services. It was worth every penny!

name: Carol Bridgers
text: Paul Booker worked with me on burial insurance for my Mother.  I was having a very difficult time with the company regarding payment.  He went out of his way, calling another funeral home in another state to help me get the information I needed.  I was very impressed with his prompt assistance.

resp.text: Carol, thank you for your kind words. It was a privilege as well as an honor to serve you and your family through these difficult times. If we can be of any further assistance, please don't hesitate to  call. - Paul Booker, Location Manager

name: Betty Williamson
text: Our family recently used Alabama Heritage  and their services for my husband.  All the arrangements were flawless, including transporting the body for burial at the National Cemetery at Montevallo. Everything was beyond expectation.

resp.text: Betty, we appreciate you allowing us to provide support and guidance throughout your Husband's memorial service. It is our goal to take care of the details to allow those we serve to pay tribute to their loved ones, and your thoughtful comments mean a great deal to everyone here. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Candace Bailey
text: Best funeral home in Montgomery Area! Paul Booker and staff try hard to make the most difficult time in life a positive memorable experience for families. Great facility, beautiful grounds, and excellent staff. I wouldn’t go anywhere else and my grandmother even bought a pre-need plan.

name: Rattana Maholan
text:
My mother passed away in December 2018 and my family was not prepared for her sudden departure. We were at a loss on what to do or where to begin with her service arrangements. All we knew was she was to rest by my father at Alabama Heritage. The Alabama Heritage staff were wonderful. Casey D Nail walked us through this difficult time and was an absolute blessing. Casey was able to compassionately take our worries away and guide us through these troubled times.
My friend also lost a family member in March 2019, and again Casey was the one who took care all the details for her family. We were talking about how wonderful Casey was to help (again) through our difficulties. Thank you Casey D Nail for being there when we needed you most.

resp.text: Rattana, it's amazing to hear that Casey compassionately took your worries away. Your recognition means a great deal to us, and we will continue to be here for you whenever you are in need. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Michelle Young
text: The spelled my husband’s name incorrectly on everything at the funeral-programs, the book,thank you cards, etc. They did correct it and gave me the corrected copies the day after the funeral but that was too late. They did give me a credit on the bill.  I understand mistakes can be made however, someone should have proofed the materials  so that didn’t happen.

name: Valeri White
text: Hoping they are working to put processes in place so other families don’t have to hurt unnecessarily. Names are important after the loss of a loved one and to have it spelled wrong on all purchased items is hurtful. It was corrected and brought to the burial site that was 2 hours away...but what good are 200 copies when the funeral was the day before. My sister in law also almost missed her husband’s burial due to the limo service being 2 hours late. Again, hoping processes will be put in place so no one has to experience this in a critical time.

name: Jennifer Lammon
text:
We had the best experience during this difficult time.
Casey and Paul were so peronalable during this, we felt like family. Casey came up with the best ideas for the service. The facility and grounds were beautiful during the service.

name: Alan Peterson
text: Alabama Heritage and their staff provide excellent and caring service.

resp.text: Alan, thank you for allowing us to be of service to you. Should you ever need additional information or assistance, please know that we are readily available. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Debbie Baker
text: I used Alabama Heritage for both of my parents’ funerals. We live out of town & they were so helpful with every detail. I would highly recommend them.

name: Makeitrain Raisins
text: The kindness and professionalism shown during the loss of my father was so wonderful .  I would highly recommend that you contact them in your time of need.

resp.text: Our team is touched by your message of gratitude, Kelly. Thank you very much for allowing us to help you honor your father, and should you need assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to let us know. - Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Hoke Kerns
text: I have absolutely no complaint.  Arrangements were dealt with very professionally,  The service could not have been better

resp.text: Hoke, I am touched to hear of your happiness with our services. Thank you for allowing us to take care of the arrangements, and please know that your recognition means a great deal to our team. If you ever need us in the future, we will be here for you.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Linda Johnson
text: Alabama Heritage did a wonderful job. Everything was above what we expected.

resp.text: Linda, I am touched to hear that we exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for allowing us to be here for you in the midst of this difficult time, and please know that your recognition is treasured by our team.  We are here for you if you ever need our support.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Brenda Turner
text: This is a remarkably beautiful funeral home and grounds. The staff is always friendly and always go above and beyond to meet your needs.

name: Victoria Hendricks
text: This is a wonderful environment the staff is great! everyone is so helpful and kind.

name: Rea Martin
text: Alabama Heritage really made the process very easy.  I could not be more happy with my experience.

resp.text:
Rea, I am pleased to know that you received the informative and respectful service we strive toward. Thank you very much for your praise, and please know that we are proud to be here for you.

-Paul Booker, General Manager

name: John Pittman
text: The staff is amazing and cared for every detail during a difficult time.  They go above and beyond.  Thank you!

name: onedeadindian
text: Paul Booker and staff did a great job with our son Samuels "Life Celebration" service. Paul gave us an option of packages that they offered. He never tried to sell us anything we didn't want. We wanted something very simple and Pau; made it happen. The day was smooth and stress free. Paul answered all our questions and got all the forms need and walked us through everything. The day Samuels ashes were ready Paul had all the paperwork ready and simple he lead me to another room and had Samuels ashes presented very professional. This is the last thing we want to deal with and Paul , staff and Alabama Heritage went above and beyond our wishes. I Thank them for that.

name: Rick Burley
text: A very smooth experience with Casey during a very difficult time.

name: Jessica Hosea
text: I believe this funeral home did everything possible to make the transition easy thank you for your fair prices it allowed this family to lay to rest the loved one that was lost

name: Emily Coaker
text: Always professional and caring for the families

resp.text: Emily, from start to finish, we strive to provide support that is compassionate and professional. Thank you very much for letting us know that we are living up to this goal, and please know that your kind words will be shared with the rest of the team. We are here for you, should you ever need anything else. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Josh Holley
text:
This funeral home did an amazing job taking care of me and my family after our Father’s sudden passing. Casey was our director and she went above and beyond to make sure that everything was perfect  and that we were also taken care of as individuals. After we picked the casket  they realized my Father was too big. The only one that would fit was more expensive but they gave it to us at the same price of the original.

Month’s later a mockingbird (My Father’s favorite bird) made a nest on our family headstone. I asked that it not be removed until after they hatched. I went back a few weeks later and the eggs had turned into little hatchlings. This Funeral home takes alot of pride in having things done professionally but also accomodates to sentimental things that the family wants.

name: Carmen DiNunzio
text: Professionalism at its finest!

resp.text: Carmen, thank you for acknowledging our professionalism and please do not hesitate to reach out should you ever need us again.  -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Herbert Smith
text: Not the most professional place to deal with.

name: Beneatha Barnes
text: Excellent service

resp.text:
Being here for you is our mission, Beneatha. If we can be of any further assistance, please don't hesitate to call. Thank you.

-Paul Booker, General Manager

name: J LaPointe
text: 1st Class Funeral Home

resp.text: Our team is grateful for your kind acknowledgement. Please know that we would be honored to assist with anything you may need in the future. -Paul Booker, General Manager

name: Wayne Dennis
text: The folks at Dignity (Leak Memory) do an outstanding job of leading the family thru the final decisions.  They are willing to help in any way possible and they communicate very well.  An all-around great experience.

resp.text: Wayne, thank you for allowing us to guide you through the final decisions and I am touched to know that our staff communicated well and made this a great experience.  If there is anything more that you need, please feel free to reach out.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Billie Lewis
text: My family had the occasion to use the services of Leak Memory for my mother’s funeral. Mr. Saleski Davis and Ms. Sandra Ragsdale did a wonderful job helping us with the arrangements.

resp.text: Billie, thank you for sharing how Saleski and Sandra did a wonderful job during your beloved mother's services and know that we were honored to be there for you and your family throughout the arrangements.  If you need anything at all, please give us a call.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Robin Garland
text: The visitation arrangements were absolutely wonderful.  It was a beautiful representation of a husband, father, veteran, and builder.  Also, the memory box containing the guest book/memory book, CD, note cards, etc. was such a lovely touch along with the 5x7 canvas prints.  Everything far exceeded our expectations.

resp.text: Robin, thank you very much for expressing your gratitude as reviews like yours truly remind us why we do what we do.  Our team is honored to be here for you, so please know that you are always welcome to reach out for additional assistance.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Robert Bell

name: Pamela Tharp Thompson
text: Beth Johnson did a fantastic job, from beginning to end, with every detail for my mother-in-law's funeral arrangements and celebration of life.  From the moment we met Beth, we felt a much-needed comfort and confidence from our loss, knowing that she was there for us, to help check off every box needed and to ensure that our loved one would receive the most top priority of services available and most richly deserved honors from her life.  Beth was there for us during a great loss to our family member that can never be replaced.  She was available through the entire process and guided us with compassion and empathy, through a most stressful time of hardship, sadness, and the great loss of a woman whom we all so loved, admired, and cherished.  Beth graciously met all our needs and fully understood the importance and magnitude of respectfully honoring such a glorious icon in our family.  At times like this, it is hard to know what to do next, and Beth Johnson was there and helped us to set aside our worries and fears, allowing us to feel our pain, and help us to move forward with our family, our loved ones, and our lives.

resp.text: Pamela, from start to finish we strive to provide support that is caring and professional. name: rita chulin
text:
So very thankful to God for the precious people He blessed us with from this establishment to help during one of the most painful and heart wrenching times in our lives.  Each one of them went above and beyond to ensure this process would be as painless and stress free as possible.  Funeral Director, Tiffany Button, was so very compassionate and patient, and her knowledge and attention to detail was so helpful.  She enabled us to make arrangements so very beautiful for our Mother's service.  Cemetery Counselor, Clark Adams, was so reassuring and kind as he guided us to where our Mother's site would be located and answered many of our questions regarding the process.  Last but by no means least Funeral Service Director, David Hinton, truly exemplifies a person that has found his "calling form God job".  His kindness, compassion, guidance  and professionalism in receiving us and our loved ones during this most heart breaking time was heaven sent.  My Family's experiences with Leak Memory Chapel began 45 years ago with the passing of my brother, Timmy.  There are no words that could truly express our gratitude for all they have so kindly and professionally assisted us with through the years.

Sincerely,

The Family of Mary Ann Pittman Michaud

name: Jennifer Davis
text: On Nov. 4, 2018 I lost my 9 year old daughter in a tragic accident. We had her brought to Leak for cremation. Jeremy and his staff handled everything beautifully and without flaw. I never got to see my little girl after they life flighted her to Children's Hospital so Jeremy set up a visitation so that I could say goodbye along with some close friends and family members. There are no words to express how much that meant to me. My daughter meant the world to me. Jeremy and his staff went above and beyond my expectations of handling everything even delivering the urn to the church. I will never be able to thank them enough for being the calm in the storm and taking such good care of not only my daughter but my family. These people truly care about your loved ones and there is no one else I would ever use in a time like this. Jeremy thank you and your staff so much for everything. I truly believe God sent us to you for a reason.

name: Stephen Randolph
text: Leak Memory was the funeral home that we used when my father passed away at the end of April, 2019. Tiffany Button was our funeral director and we could not have been happier with her and the way everything was handled.  Tiffany was extremely sympathetic to a family's state of mind when having to make final decisions, working patiently and kindly.  Both the visitation and funeral service were held at separate locations away from Leak Memory.  Tiffany and Clark Adams (from the cemetery) worked to accommodate last minute date changes that had to be made.  Tiffany went above and beyond with the memorial program, providing an additional option not originally presented, which was the perfect choice.  She and her team beautifully handled the two different locations and graveside service, making sure that all was in order as the family arrived.  She stayed in constant contact with us throughout the process, both by email and phone, even sending a last minute email to assure me that my father's hair was parted correctly, as my mother wished.  Her good work did not end at the cemetery, calling my mother several times afterward to check on her, and to coordinate the completion of the final details.  Her thoughtful kindness and professionalism, both during and after the funeral, have ensured that not just my father, but the whole family, is at peace.

resp.text: Stephen, it's wonderful to read your words of praise, as our team works diligently to ensure we're offering thoughtful and professional service. Thank you for allowing us to be there for you and your family, and please know that we are always here if you should need us in the future. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

text: We had an excellent experience with Leak recently.  The staff is patient, flexible and caring. name: Allie Parker
text:
There are not enough words to praise Jeremy Wade and Leak Memory Chapel. Properly caring for the deceased is one of Jeremy’s innate gifts. He is thorough, devoted, and extremely knowledgeable. He will go over and beyond his duties to make sure your needs and wishes are met. In my biased opinion all should call him immediately when not knowing where to turn after losing a loved one.

Our family was introduced to Jeremy the day of my father’s passing in February of this year. To our disbelief, on the same day, my father-in-law passed away in his hometown a few hours from Montgomery. As one can imagine chaos was an understatement, but once Jeremy stepped in, a sense of calm and order took over. He made sure all we wanted for the funeral was honored and if any requests seemed unobtainable, Jeremy magically made it happen. If we forgot a detail, Jeremy would respectfully remind us of what was needed. The day of my father’s funeral and burial Jeremy and his staff had every step beautifully orchestrated. He made saying “goodbye” a tranquil experience.

Six months after my father's death the unimaginable occurred. My son lost his life outside of the state of Alabama. The circumstances were beyond horrible and extremely complex. I do believe Jeremy was the second person I called after we were told the news. He said, “Where is your son and who do I call?” Except for a few details, Jeremy handled the rest. He made the complexities look trivial and again orchestrated a perfect funeral and burial.

It would be unfair if I did not commend the entire staff at Leak Memory Chapel. From the one who compassionately answers the phone to those who work tirelessly behind the scenes, all at Leak are a team whose goal is to treat the deceased and family with dignity and respect.

Lastly, if your loved one passes while away from Montgomery, if available, use a Dignity funeral home. Leak Memory Chapel is a Dignity funeral home and I promise having sister funeral homes working together removes many layers of stress and grief from a trying situation.

Thank you Jeremy Wade and Leak Memory Chapel. You conducted two flawless funerals that gave us a great sense of peace and closure.

text: We have used Leak Memory during several passings of our loved ones! Everyone is very supportive and comforting! Very nice people! During the passing of my stepmother, Rhiannon Singleton was awesome! She helped us through every step and was there for anything we needed! Thank you for all you do!

name: Eric Torrillo
text: Leak Memory did a wonderful job under the most trying of times. Beth Johnson was amazing to me and my family. She was there every step of the way and went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable with everything during the process. Beth has been just as helpful with things after the funeral.

name: Jeanne Spires
text: Leak Memory, especially Beth Johnson, made our experience so much easier than I expected.  Beth held my hand through everything.  She explained every step to me and the process went so smoothly, which eased my stress and sorrow.  The visitation was so beautiful.  The way that she listened to what my Mother liked and matched her to a "T" with the remembrance display was incredible.  If you are ever faced with needing a funeral home and Director you must request Beth Johnson.  She takes the lead and you don't have to worry about any details because she handles them all with professionalism, compassion, and sympathy.  Words cannot express how much Beth and the entire Leak Memory staff meant to us during our time of loss.

resp.text: Thank you so much for you touching words about Beth and our team.  We were so proud to have been able to help honor your Mother and offer comfort to your family in whatever way we could. Thank you very much for your recognition for our team's dedication, and please know that we are only a phone call away if you should need anything else.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Sarah Belcher
text: Leak Memorial was wonderful in assisting us with arrangements for a friend’s services. Rhiannon Singleton went over and beyond helping us and was extremely kind. She made sure all of the details, especially pictures, were just as we wanted them. It was a great experience and we couldn’t be more thankful!

name: Andrew Stinson
text: Leak Memory Chapel handled two funerals in my family.  We were blessed because we had an excellent t funeral director, Ray Miller. He was professional and courteous. Both services were a remarkable tribute to the lives that both my grandmother and grandfather lived.  He was patient and understood how important the memorial services were to us. He went over and beyond what we expected him to do.  We know that he cares about the people he helps.

name: Lee Dodson
text: We have done 3 funeral's with Leak Memory. Jeremy has been excellent on all 3. Not pushy and took all the time we needed. Even followed up afterwards to make sure all was well.

resp.text: Thank you for complimenting Jeremy's help during your three services, Lee. We do everything in our power to ensure that those we serve are given all the time they wish during difficult circumstances. Please don't hesitate to follow up with us, if we can be of any help. -John Guelde, Manager

name: Jennifer Ward
text: They did  a great job with everything and they tell the story so well my grandmother was so pretty I loved everything they did a great job we have been using leak memory funeral home for years I liked the people who took care of us and they treat you like family and everyone that works there are so sweet and caring keep up the good work thanks so much for everything :)

resp.text:
Jennifer, it was our treasured responsibility to honor your grandmother. Thank you for giving us the chance to exceed your expectations, and please know that your family is in our thoughts.

-Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Jean Worthington
text:
I cannot say enough good things about Leak Memory and Beth Johnson.
We lost our loved one suddenly and unexpectedly.
I knew nothing of the process to take care of the arrangements but from the moment that I spoke to Beth, all of the stress and overwhelming confusion was removed. She was extremely comforting and walked my adult children and me through every step with no pressure at all, only guiding us through our choices. She was a tremendous comfort and support, all the way to the end. She was always accessible to answer any questions and concerns. The sudden loss of our loved one was traumatic enough and without her compassion and guidance I don’t know how we could have made it through this.
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts Beth Johnson! You & Leak Memory are amazing and have my 100% highest recommendation.

resp.text: Jean, nothing makes us prouder than hearing that a member of our team was able to provide you with such compassionate service. Being here for those we serve during the most difficult times is something we take very seriously, and I will be sure to convey your recognition to Beth.  Please do not hesitate to reach out if there is anything else I can assist you with.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Lyle Wilder
text: Leak Memory has provided loving, caring service to my family for several decades now through the loss of so many loved ones.  In recent years, I've worked on the Christchurch Altar Guild and have been extremely pleased with the professionalism of the teams sent out for funerals.  I recently worked a funeral with Tiffany Button and cannot express enough the knowledge and comfort she provided not just for the family, but for those of us working the funeral for our church.  Anglican funerals are a bit different, but she took our special needs and worked with us to ensure everything went smoothly.  I had worked one other funeral with her, and I must admit, I was so relieved to see her last Monday morning. I look forward to the chance to work with her and others from Leak Memory in the future.

name: Kim Endress
text: My mother passed away recently and we chose Leak Memory to handle her cremation. Rhiannon Singleton was our director and she took great care of our family when we needed it most. Her compassion and professionalism made the process so easy for us.

name: Beth Thompson
text: Leak Memory did a great job of helping us with the recent burial of my Grandmother. The staff was friendly and very respectful of our wishes. Beth Johnson helped us every step of the way and made it as uncomplicated as possible. She was very comforting in our time of grief.

name: Sharon Harrison
text: I want to know why ya'll Angie Shires with out telling her friends about this burial.. because we wanted to go to see our friend Angie Shires

resp.text: Sharon, thank you for your feedback and for reaching out.  Unfortunately, we did not serve you or the family of Angie.  Please reach out to me at Jeremy.Wade@DignityMemorial.com so that I may put you in contact with the correct location.  Thank you.  -Jeremy Wade, General Manager

name: Peggy Kelly
text: The staff at Leak-Memory was patient, compassionate, and professional in assisting me in making arrangements at the time of my brother's sudden passing.  Beth Johnson was very kind and supportive during the many decisions I had to make.

resp.text:

-Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

text: Leak Memory is a very warm, caring and loving place.  Jeremy and Tiffany were very humble and respectful during my great uncles funeral.  Thank you Leak Memory!

resp.text:
Receiving feedback like yours truly reaffirms our commitment to offering exceptional care, Katherine. From everyone here, thank you very much for sharing.

-John Guelde

name: Renee Dodson
text: We said goodbye to my beloved mother in law earlier this week. This is the 3rd Celebration of Life service that Jeremy Wade has handled for our family. Just like the previous ones, he did an excellent job of handling our wishes and meeting our needs. The visitation was delightful in a setting that did not even resemble a funeral home. The room was spacious, beautifully decorated and inviting. Much like visiting in someone's home which made the experience less sad. My mother in law was always smiling and cheerful, a delightful soul and the setting and service was exactly what she would have wanted. Truly a celebration! Thank you Jeremy and staff at Leak Memory for making Mamaw's "going home" perfect!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking a moment to validate our efforts, Renee. It's very gratifying to hear that the experience felt much like visiting someone's home. We are always here to help you and your family, so if there is anything further that we can attend to, please give us a call. -John Guelde, Market Director

name: Randy Hickman
text: My family has used Leak memory in the past and when my Dad passed away I knew in my heart where I was supposed to have my family and friends say our goodbyes to someone who ment so much to so many people. But myself with my sister and brother had never had to do anything like this before and we wanted it to be perfect to honor our father and with our director Tiffany's help.It did!! She and the hole staff at leak memory were so understanding and went out of their way to make sure we had a service that honored our father's memory and one that  us his children could be proud of. I want to thank everyone there and Greenwood cemetery for going out of there way to make this happen.  I have no doubts that when the time comes and we all know it will.  I will be back at leak memory.  P.S  i hope it's a good while.  God Bless,

resp.text: Thank you, Randy, for expressing your thoughts. We were truly fortunate to be able to help you and your family honor your father. I will make sure to convey your gratitude to Tiffany, and I hope you won't hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can do for your family going forward. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: LaVondra Dyess
text: I found the services to be above expectations in planning a funeral service for my friend, Jimmy Henry.  The representative went over and beyond the norm in guiding me through the process.  She was most helpful in several aspects of the plan.  While there was a pre-planned contract, she helped as best she could to limit the extra costs that were not in the previously paid contract.  The services were great.  The representative came to the service to see that everything we had discussed was in place.  Also a phone call after the service revealed the desire to see  that all went as planned.

resp.text: LaVondra, we take great pride in ensuring that every detail is attended to and that we are being conscious of your needs in this difficult time. Thank you for sharing that you received respectful assistance from our team and please know that we are always here if you should ever need us. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Leigh Ann Roberts
text: Leak Memories staff was wonderful to us during a difficult time. Jeremy worked with us on making some difficult decisions. He called and keep us informed and done what ever we asked. They all were so very helpful. Thank you, to all we come in contact with. And may God bless all of you.

text: Sadly, my wife's sweet mother passed away recently. Leak-Memory did an excellent job of guiding the family through the funeral process with care and compassion. Our funeral director was Tiffany Button, a lovely woman who smoothly and sweetly took care of every detail. She could not have been any nicer. The facility has been well cared for and updated over the years...I know....been to many services there. We had zero issues or complaints before, during, and after the service. Highly recommended if the need arises.

Thank you Rhiannon Singleton and Leak Memory Chapel.

text: Very nice facility and staff. Rhiannon went above and beyond and treated us like family. Thanks to her I will highly recommend this place to others.

name: Davis Quill
text: In April of this year, my grandmother suddenly passed away. My family used Leak Memory's services for her funeral and burial and they made a difficult situation much more manageable. Ray Miller and Tiffany Button took great care of my family and I as we laid our matriarch to rest. Thank you Leak Memory and thank you Ray and Tiffany.

name: Glenda Hope
text: Leak Memory is like family, my Dad worked there for many years, when my Mother passed away suddenly in 2014, they cared for us and carried us through one of the worse times in my life and I know my Dad’s. Then when my Dad passed away 3 years later, I could not have asked for a better service or compassion from everyone. Jeremy Wade meet with me and my Sister and just made everything so simple for me.  Every time I have friends that have family that pass away I make a phone call to Jeremy and ask that they take good care of them as a favor to me, not that it is necessary because they will anyway. But I just want them to know I want them treated as “Family” . The best way to handle your arrangements is to plan ahead and go see Frank Hester, he is awesome and he will handle everything for you then your family will not have to wander what you wanted. My parents did that, me and my husband have prearranged and it is so nice to know that when the time comes it is taken care of. Leak Memory is the place to go for professional service and compassionate service.

name: Diane Weil
text:
I have been to many services in the chapel at Leak Memory, at other places of worship and at gravesites handled by them, but it seems in the past couple of years there have been more funerals. I find the staff to be truly interested in the practices of different faiths so they can be informed, helpful and respectful. They try to anticipate needs e.g if it is hot outside, they provide water and umbrellas. It is always sad being there because someone has died, but they are helpful while being discrete and are willing to do all they can for the family to have the service that is meaningful to them.
Under unusual circumstances a year and a half ago, a friend asked me to actually do the funeral of a spouse and I was incredibly nervous. Many thanks to Jeremy Wade at Leak Memory who encouraged, supported and guided me so that the family got the meaningful service they wanted. I am grateful and recommend Leak Memory without reservation.

resp.text: Diane, I truly appreciate you taking the time to describe your experiences with us in such detail. Thank you for commending our expertise and our dedication to all those we serve. Your approval means a great deal to us and it was an honor for me to help you out when it was needed. If there are any requests or questions that we could take care of for you, please feel free to let us know. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: BRENDA TURNER
text:
My brother and I lost our Mother on November 16.  We met Beth Johnson of Leak Memory shorty thereafter.  She was with us every step of the way through this painful and trying time.  We got to know Beth.  We told stories about our families  and laughed and cried.  She guided us through all the tedious paperwork always attentive to our feelings and needs.  She lead us through the planning of the visitation and the funeral together..  She became our friend.  After the graveside ceremony
I asked Gary how they did this job day in and day out.  He said it was their mission.

name: J. Runyon
text: In the past year I lost my father in law and then my wife, unexpectedly. On both occasions I was assisted by Rhiannon Singleton. I can not say enough about the things she has done to help not only me, but my family, and even friends. She was attentive to our every need and was available to me any time I had the smallest question or concern. She even came in on her off days to help with last minute changes and has called and sent cards over the past few months just to see how my family and I were. The love and compassion given by the staff of Leak Memory can not be found anywhere else. Thank you for all that you've done and continue to do!

name: anonymous one
text: Janet C. Geary funeral on July 24, 2018. Just to let you know David Self went out of his way to be very accommodating in our time of need. And he handled the arrangements very professionally, and has helped in every way possible in making this an easier process. If in the future, I need this service again I would definitely use Leak Memory Chapel in Montgomery, Al. Thank you. Judy Ertley (Sister)

name: Karen Day
text:
I’m sitting here, looking at the folder that Beth Johnson gave me - she was our funeral director for my dad. What a whirlwind. Less than 24 hours after she returned my sudden evening call, we had everything set. There were about six major decisions/things to plan, and she walked my mother and me through every step of it. She railroaded paperwork and summoned an honor guard out of thin air for the Tuesday of Thanksgiving. Not easy!
Looking back, I think the heaviest thing was the feeling of making the choices alone, choices that had to stand without a tableful of family to offer opinions. Beth listened, laid out all the elements and possibilities, and helped us put together a beautiful service that suited Dad and our family. Without her, we would have had to work much harder to reach closure on such short notice.
So back to the folder - on the cover, it says “Life Well Celebrated.” And thanks to Beth, Dad’s truly was.

name: Mike Vaughn
text: Beth was very caring and professional.  No high pressure sales pitch.

resp.text: I'm fortunate that Beth was there to provide the guidance and support that you needed, Mike. We always want to make all those we serve feel comfortable. If you ever have additional questions or requests, please let us know. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Buck Jehle
text: For such a painful moment. Leam Memory Chapel made the process easier.

resp.text: Buck, thank you very much for allowing us to make this emotional day easier for your family.  It was of the utmost importance to us that your needs were met, and reading your review gives us comfort. We are here for you any time you need us.  -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Kassie Culpepper
text: Jeremy Wade and his staff were so compassionate and caring during our time of need.  They will never know how much that meant to us.

resp.text: On behalf of the team, thank you very much for your acknowledgement of our compassion. We are honored to be of service, and we appreciate your support. -Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: totally woodlawn high stuff
text: The staff is very friendly kind and helpful especially Beth Johnson Facility is lovely I received excellent personal service

resp.text:
It is important to us that each service is personalized and meaningful, and it is truly wonderful to read your kind words. Please don't hesitate to call if there is anything else we may attend to.
-Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: Linda Westbrook
text: The staff at Leak Memory is like family. As you arrive at the lovely home setting you enter into a place of peace and comfort knowing all of your needs will be handled by warm caring people.

name: Teresa Thomas
text: Tiffany was awesome and understanding, very helpful and efficient.

resp.text:
Thank you for the heartfelt message and the comments regarding Tiffany. There is no greater compliment than knowing we gave you a little peace of mind during this difficult and uncertain time.

-Jeremy Wade, Location Manager

name: mccoyway
text: Rhiannon Singleton was very helpful helping my Mom for preparations for my Aunts funeral!

name: Marcey Zimmerman
text: What a nice facility and caring staff. Tiffany Button was very professional and kind to our family during such a difficult time.

name: C Porter
text: This is the location that my parents used for their funerals the staff that's real nice having both funerals.

name: Alice Sharker
text: Very nice service for my grandmother. Thank you Rhiannon, and the staff at Leak, for taking great care of our family!

name: James Cole
text: Very Cordial , Professional And  Courteous
